block.name: Center Freq Estimation
block.doc:
Estimates center frequency of a burst and re-centers it.
Parameters: 'method' selects method of center frequency estimation. Coerce quantizes to the nearest frequency in the channel_freqs, rms is a Root-Mean-Squared method, and half_power is a half-power point in the cumulative sum of the PSD.
Required metadata: 'sample_rate' and 'center_frequency'
Optional metadata: 'relative_frequency'
Produced metdata: 'bandwidth', 'snr_db', corrections to 'center_frequency' and 'relative_frequency'
